titles.title: Innocent Owners' Forfeiture Protection Act of 1996
To provide that the property of innocent owners is not subject to forfeiture under the laws of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/28/1996--Introduced. Innocent Owners' Forfeiture Protection Act of 1996 - Prohibits any law of the United States from being interpreted to permit or require the forfeiture of the property interest of an innocent owner by reason of the criminal conduct of another.
